name: LTD EDITION DOUBLE DVD SET
description: CHARITY LIMITED EDITION DVD THE RUTS & HENRY ROLLINS plus VERY SPECIAL GUESTS Recorded at the Islington Academy on 16th July 2007 Featuring THE RUTS with HENRY ROLLINS. THE DAMNED. TOM ROBINSON. MISTY IN ROOTS. UK SUBS SPLODGE JOHN OTWAY ED TUDOR POLE TV SMITH THE PEAFISH HOUSE BAND feat Lee Harris(Blockheads)Tony Barber (Buzzcocks) and Rowland Rivron JOHN ROBB Disc 1 = 2 and half hours of live footage from the benefit gig on 16th july 2007 Disc 2 = Interviews with the artists who performed on the night. PLUS a booklet describing the history of the Ruts written by John Robb and including an exclusive email interview by John King with Henry Rollins. It also contains exclusive gig photos. This first run of this DVD is a very special limited edition tribute to Paul Fox and Malcolm Owen it will include extra footage and a signed photo and will only be available for a limited period, while stocks last. THIS WILL BE THE ONLY TIME THAT THIS SPECIAL TRIBUTE EDITION WILL BE AVAILABLE. The normal double DVD package will go on sale later in the Year and will cost Â£15 ALL PROFITS FROM THIS DVD GO TO CHARITY
